headline: Stifel Nicolaus Reiterates Buy Rating on EPAM Systems, Keeps PT at $246
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE:EPAM) is one of the 10 Best AI Software Stocks to Buy Now. On August 8, Stifel Nicolaus reiterated a Buy rating on EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE:EPAM) stock, keeping the price target at $246. Stifel Nicolaus analyst David Grossman kept his rating on EPAM Systems following the Q2 FY2025 results. EPAM achieved […]
